definition.text: This indicator calculates ten Donchian channels and combines them in a similar way to the EMA based guppy indicator.

paragraphs.text: Donchian Trend Ribbon on the Charts
By calculating ten Donchian channels, the indicator then provides a final output based upon the consensus of the trend direction of all of the calculations.
The following properties are available to access:

| Product Name | Product Variable | Properties |
| DonchianTrendRibbon | dtr | value0 - value9 |

The length of the initial Donchian calculation can be adjusted by locating and opening the Javascript Code under Data Building Procedure -> Procedure Loop under "Donchian Trend Ribbon" Procedure Loop.
